resources: environment variables: SLURM_ARRAY_JOB_ID, SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID, for_type, load_filepath, jid, walltime, inf_cores
details.description: This script appears to be a SLURM job submission script that utilizes MATLAB to run a function called 'sse_inference'. It leverages the parallel computing toolbox for possible distributed computation and manages temporary files in a designated folder.
